name: Chocolate Cheesecake I
author: JJOHN32
summary: A chocolate lover's delight!  Top with cherry pie filling or sweetened strawberries.
directions: Prepare crumb crust by combining cracker or wafer crumbs, butter or margarine, and 2 tablespoons sugar
Press mixture into bottom and 2 inches up sides of a 9 inch springform pan
Melt chocolate chips in top of a double boiler over hot water
Beat cream cheese and 1 cup sugar in a large mixing bowl until smooth and creamy
Gradually pour in chocolate mixture beating on low speed until well-blended
Add 1/2 cup sour cream, flour, vanilla
Bake in a preheated oven at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 55 - 60 minutes or until filling is firm
Cool cheesecake 1 hour without opening door
Chill several hours or over night
Garnish just before serving with sweetened sour cream made by combining 1 tablespoon sugar with 1/2 cup sour cream
